about_the_game:
2023 Annual Pass

Includes all 15 sets of DLC outfits upcoming in 2023.

Private High School Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Private high school uniform hairstyle, top, bottom, alternate bottom, another alternate bottom, giant compass.

Retro Detective Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Retro detective hat, top, bottom, aristocrat-customized revolver.

Seaside Vacation Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Seaside vacation hat, top, bottom, classical guitar.

Little Hero Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Little hero hat, top, bottom, golden python revolver.

Love Executioner Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Love executioner hat, top, bottom, death's scythe.

Casino Attendant Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Casino attendant hat, top, bottom, another bottom, yet another bottom, assassination dinner knife.

SM Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: SM pack hat, top, bottom, painful leather whip.

Arabian Attire Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Arabian attire hat, top, bottom, golden AK74M.

Indian Attire Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Indian attire hat, top, bottom, discipline cane.

Fierce Bear Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Fierce bear hat, top, bottom, bear's heavy machine gun.

Playful Cat Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Playful cat hat, top, bottom, meow-meow submachine gun.

Loyal Dog Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Loyal dog hat, top, bottom, woof-woof shotgun.

Gentle Panda Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Gentle panda hat, top, bottom, hidden-blade bamboo staff.

Christmas Snowman Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Christmas snowman hat, top, bottom, snowball launcher.

Haunted Carnival Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Haunted carnival hat, top, bottom, carnival backpack, terror park chainsaw.

Celebrity Sports Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Celebrity sports hat, top, bottom, another bottom, yet another bottom, gold-plated trophy.

Local High School Pack (Unreleased)
Includes: Local high school hairstyle, top, bottom, another bottom, yet another bottom, hardwood triangle board.

Comedic Quartet Headgear (Unreleased)
Includes: Mermaid headgear, horse face headgear, rat face headgear, salted egg headgear.

Release Deadline: 2023.10.07.23:59:59.

name: Rebirth Evolution  - 2023 Annual Pass
short_description: Includes all 15 sets of DLC outfits upcoming in 2023. Attention! This content will not affect the game content, only for additional appearance equipment.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
